price: (20) And if it had not been for the favor of Allāh upon you and His mercy...[983] and because Allāh is Kind and Merciful.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walawlā faḍlu al-lahi ʿalaykum waraḥmatuhu wa-anna al-laha raūfun raḥīmun
